text: So Far Gone is the debut EP of Canadian rapper Drake. It was released on September 15, 2009, originally released as a mixtape on February 13, 2009. ==Track listing== ==Chart history== Chart (2009) Peak position Canadian Albums Chart 15 U.S. Billboard 200 6 U.S. Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 3 U.S. Billboard Top Rap Albums 2 ==References== Category:2009 albums Category:Drake (musician) albums
title: So Far Gone
